mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_room ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room ( room_id, room_name, linked_recruitment_id, user1_id, user2_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{roomId}, #{roomName}, #{linkedRecruitmentId}, #{user1Id}, #{user2Id}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT cr.* FROM chat_room cr JOIN recruitment_member rm ON cr.linked_recruitment_id = rm.recruitment_id JOIN users u ON rm.user_id = u.id WHERE u.username = #{username} AND cr.room_name != '친구 채팅' ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (room_id, sender, message, message_type, created_at) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{sender}, #{message}, #{messageType}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, u.nickname as senderNickname, u.image as senderImage FROM chat_message m JOIN users u ON m.sender = u.username WHERE m.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY m.created_at ASC
